summary: A poet (Sanjay Dutt) and his best friend (Salman Khan) fall in love with the same woman (Madhuri Dixit).
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Madhuri Dixit|Salman Khan|Ekta Sohini|Laxmikant Berde|Kader Khan|Reema Lagoo|Anjana Mumtaz|Dinesh Hingoo|Yunus Parvez|Dipinti|Raja Duggal|Shalaka Karnik|Raju Shrestha|Poonam Shetty|Tej Sapru|Vikas Anand|Sudhakar Bokade|Master Imran|Pankaj Udhas|Piloo J. Wadia
title: Saajan
